ygData.subject: Re: Price of higer lv runes
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Ack, I ve been hoping to find a page ANYWHERE (granted we re probably on different servers, I m on Veeshan) and no one seems to have them, or i get oh
ygData.messageBody:
> Is a price for a Words and runes and pages similar? I have seen that
> enchanter pages are nearly imposible to sell as enchanters are nowere to
> find eheh. anyone knows what is percentual diference in number of
> enchanters against number of orher classes in game ?


Ack, I've been hoping to find a page ANYWHERE (granted we're probably on
different servers, I'm on Veeshan) and no one seems to have them, or i get
'oh sorry, i just sold the one i found to a vendor' ..

Whenever I do manage to find a page or find someone who has one and is
wanting to sell it, it's ALWAYS pages 23, 24, 26, or 30 of the grimiore. I
havent even seen a page from velishoul's since I was level 16 and found a
few myself. And everytime I'm in a group AND if someone happens to find a
page on a loot, then they always have some friend that they give them too.

So far I've gotten the spells from 23, 24, 26, 30, and 312. I have parts to
390 and 375, but cant find other stuff. Getting a little annoyed that i cant
find pages but i see those damn Words all over .. I'm currently level 22 and
would like to have the spells for level 24 (my next spell level) on hand, or
in the very least find somthing interesting to try and reasearch.
